extendedInfo.description: Make your friends jealous, place a perfect weather report on top of your Instagram photo.Sharing options : â Facebook â Twitter â Instagram âCRASH ALERT - all users with phones that have 512MB RAM - please REDUCE size of photo to 3MPIXELS in camera settings it will fix crash problem.Escaping for the weekend and your friends are staying home? Make them suffer with a beach photo and weather conditions from Hawaii or Malibu.Photo from a morning session of seaside jogging? Make your friends jealous.Traveling across sunny and colourful Thailand when it's a cold and dark winter in Minneapolis? Show them who is the real player here!Snowboarding in Colorado in deep powder and sunny 25F when your mates are closed in an office space with no chances for holidays? YOU RULE!How does it work? - InstaWeather Pro is your weather overlay App for Instagram!Thanks to InstaWeather Pro you can share on Instagram the weather report and forecast from the place where your are now â on top of your favourite photo that you have just snapped with your Android phone.Picture shared through Instagram, combined with all the important forecast data and place name, gives full view of actual outside conditions!You can easily choose your favourite skin from 9 available with various weather data: from current temperature and simple info about the location to very detailed forecast with air pressure, temperature, rain, wind power and direction.You can also choose the period of the displayed forecast: today, next few days or a whole week.It works with Celsius & Fahrenheit, kilometres, miles and many others.Install and share the weather with friends! Let the weather be always good for you!Make your personal weather report NOW!!

reviews.title: The 3mpx picture size limit is a joke!
reviews.comment: Who wants to change their 8mpx camera to a <3mpx setting, forget to change it back and end up with inferior photos?  Who wants to fiddle about resizing photos just so that they can use in Instaweather? Until that is fixed ... I\'m not interested.
reviews.author: David Daniels

reviews.title: Malfunction
reviews.comment: Don\'t work well at all on ASUS T700 pad.
reviews.author: Stefan Persson

reviews.title: How do I change the weather display from centigrade to farenheit?
reviews.comment: It is a good app except that I want weather dipsplayed in F.   UPDATE: I found the invisible settings button. I can now change temp to F. Change rating to 4 stars.
